channel.title: python on jupart's blog
channel.description: Recent content in python on jupart's blog

item.title: Setting up to deploy Kivent to Android
item.description: I recently put together a new machine and needed to get my python toolchain back up and running, so I decided to record the needed steps and post them here.

item.title: Attractor - a game about magnetism
item.description: Magnets are awesome! They have the ability to exert force on other objects via an invisible hand. I was working on a separate project when I had an idea: a game where the inputs only change a magnet’s pole. Attractor is the game I made with this in mind.
